name: Super Speed Sport Car: Racing!
description:
The world of speed reaches the Japanese streets!

6 cars compete for the reign of the sport cars racing!

Win the races and become the master of the most prestigious speed championship!

Choose from the available sports cars and enjoy the atmosphere of illegal night races!

Be dazzled by the stunning graphics that recreate the wonderful city of Tokyo!

Avoid bumping against other sports cars while you impose your car to your opponents!

Super high speeds have never been for cowards, dare to compete at a high level and take your sports car to the top of the podium!

If you love the asphalt adrenaline this is your car racing game!

Twitter: @LabCave
Facebook: www.facebook.com/LabCaveGames
